## Steps to reproduce

```powershell
Right click on mouse after executing tasklist
```

## Expected behavior

```none
As far as I know I shouldn't do anything
```

## Actual behavior

```none
It is trying to execute all program in my computer.
Here is a video : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YOxSnOgZ724
Before screen-recording my PC just restarted it self, and then I couldn't reproduce it.
Then I executed tasklist again and right click and it was re-produced.
I think it has something to do with buffer.
```

comments.body: Right click is paste, which looks like what is happening there.  Either way PowerShell itself doesn't have any hooks into mouse events, if you have an issue/feedback you'd want to file that on [microsoft/terminal](https://github.com/microsoft/terminal) or feedback hub/user voice for conhost.
